title: How the Right Creators Can Transform Your B2B Marketing
description: In this episode of the Duct Tape Marketing Podcast, I interviewed Nick Bennett, a pioneering expert in B2B influencer marketing who's reshaping how companies approach digital marketing strategies. As a co-founder of TACK and author of B2B Influencer Marketing: Work With Creators to Generate Authentic and Effective Marketing, Bennett reveals the transformative power of authentic creator partnerships in today's competitive business landscape. The conversation uncovers a critical shift in B2B marketing: moving from traditional, corporate-driven approaches to a more human-centric, creator-powered strategy that drives real business results. Bennett's insights demonstrate how the right creators can become powerful catalysts for brand awareness, lead generation, and revenue growth. Today we discussed: [01:02] Who is Nick Bennett?
